DOC.detailed_description: AI cause virus occurs naturally among bird . Because virus ability mutate form efficiently spread among human population , AI potential cause pandemic . The purpose study evaluate safety immune response AI vaccine H9N2 ( 6-2 ) AA ca Reassortant ( A/Chicken/Hong Kong/G9/97 x A/Ann Arbor/6/60 ca ) healthy adult never expose H9N2 virus . This study last approximately 6 week , maximum approximately 20 week . Participation include 10-day minimum hospital stay isolation unit Bayview Medical Center Johns Hopkins University . Participants admitted isolation unit 2 day prior vaccination . At vaccination , participant give one dose H9N2 ( 6-2 ) AA ca Reassortant ( A/Chicken/Hong Kong/G9/97 x A/Ann Arbor/6/60 ca ) vaccine form nose drop . Each day next 7 day , participant ' vital sign monitor nasal wash collect test presence vaccine virus . Participants may discharge hospital 3 consecutive negative viral culture , Day 7 vaccination . Follow-up visit occur Days 21 , 28 , 42 , include blood collection physical exam . Participants receive first dose ( A/Chicken/Hong Kong/G9/97 x A/Ann Arbor/6/60 ca ) vaccine ask receive second dose vaccine 4 12 week receive initial dose . Study procedures identical relate first vaccination .
